name: Magyarock VR
description:
Magyarock is an acronym. Magyar means Hungarian and you know the other. :)
Magyarok = Hungarians
Magyarock = Hungarian Rock

Magyarock VR is a drumming rhythm game where you can discover Hungarian metal / rock bands
while you are climbing to the top of the leaderboards.
The tracklist is diverse, maybe you will find your new favorite band while you are playing.

  • 20 unique songs
  • 4 environments
  • compete against others on the leaderboards
  • 4 difficulties for each song
  • custom map support
  • streamer friendly (you can put song infos to the corners, you can choose from different cameras)
  • LIV
  • be the part of our community and make the game better with new ideas

Discord server:

https://discord.gg/CSrwQnv7pd
